participant_2.background:
My family and I are close, but we live in different states.
I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets.
my mom lives with me.
My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me.
my favorite meal is chicken and rice.

content.text: Hi, I'm a farmer! I've been working on my farm for over 20 years.
Oh wow, that's quite a while! What kind of farm do you have?
It's a small farm, we mostly grow fruits and vegetables.
That's cool! I like green apples.
Me too! They're my favorite fruit.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
What are their names?
The dog's name is Buddy and the cat's name is Mittens.
Those are cute names!
Thanks! I'm proud of the love and care I give to my family and pets.
That's great to hear! My family and I are close, but we live in different states.
I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm glad you're close even though you live far away.
Thanks! I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets.
That's really nice! My most valued possession is my teddy bear from childhood.
Mine is probably my Nintendo 64 because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me.
That's a great choice!
Thanks! What's your favorite meal?
My favorite meal is chicken and rice.
That's a classic! I love it too.
Me too! I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! This has been a fun conversation.
Me too! It's nice to meet you, have a great day!
You too
